tool.name: ecomet_species_venn
tool.description: Create Venn diagrams for seasonal variability of species features
tool.help:
========================= Eco-Metabolomics workflow =========================
This is the computational workflow to study the seasonal variation of secondary metabolites in nine different bryophytes.
Module | Venn diagrams |
Description | Create Venn diagrams for seasonal variability of species features |
----- Input -----
Input Rdata | Rdata file |
------ Output ------
Venn Diagram for Brachythecium rutabulum | PDF plot |
Venn Diagram for Calliergonella cuspidata | PDF plot |
Venn Diagram for Fissidens taxifolius | PDF plot |
Venn Diagram for Grimmia pulvinata | PDF plot |
Venn Diagram for Hypnum cupressiforme | PDF plot |
Venn Diagram for Marchantia polymorpha | PDF plot |
Venn Diagram for Plagiomnium undulatum | PDF plot |
Venn Diagram for Polytrichum strictum | PDF plot |
Venn Diagram for Rhytidiadelphus squarrosus | PDF plot |
Venn Diagram for pleurocarpous species | PDF plot |
Venn Diagram for acrocarpous species | PDF plot |
---------------------------------------------------
.. class:: infomark
**Authors**
For updates and documentation, please visit **https://github.com/korseby/container-mtbls520** or contact **Kristian Peters (kpeters@ipb-halle.de)**.
